entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 then north 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
